features.title: Precision RTD Wafers
features.description: The Cowboy Wafer by Sigma Sensors integrates with the prober and the controller to enable fully automated, operator-free calibration that is accredited by ISO/IEC 17025 and traceable to the international standard. Featuring low-noise, low-drift PT-1000 sensors, the Cowboy Wafer achieves sensor-to-sensor accuracy up to 0.03째C and absolute accuracy up to 0.1째C, and is available in 150mm, 200mm, and 300mm sizes with up to 24 sensors.

features.title: On-site Prober Calibration
features.description: Sigma Sensors offers on-site prober calibration services within the EU and USA using the Cowboy Wafer system. The Cowboy Wafer system holds an accredited ISO/IEC 17025 calibration with traceability to ITS-90, allowing you to document your compliance to international standards. Our technicians can calibrate multiple probers in parallel and can work around your schedule, allowing you to minimize tool down-time and task-switching within your engineering team.

features.title: RTD Wafer Calibration
features.description: Sigma Sensors can calibrate any RTD wafer, regardless of maker, from -60째C to +200째C. We offer fast turnaround times of less than 4 weeks on our ISO/IEC 17025 accredited calibration services. For each calibration performed, we issue a Calibration Certificate that complies with ISO/IEC 17025 guidelines and includes both temperature measurement data and standards used, so that you can demonstrate tracability to ITS-90.
